name: Glentham Life Sciences - Beta-Sitosterol 97%
description: Glentham Life Sciences, a fine chemicals manufacturer and supplier, offers Beta-Sitosterol at 97% purity for barrier repair and anti-inflammatory applications. High purity ensures consistent performance in cosmetic formulations. Beta-sitosterol is the most abundant phytosterol and provides excellent barrier support properties.
notes: CAS 83-46-5. High purity (97%) from fine chemicals manufacturer. Beta-sitosterol is the most abundant phytosterol in plants, typically comprising 50-60% of total plant sterols. Provides barrier support and anti-inflammatory benefits. Suitable for research and commercial formulations.
